fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shoot someone, except you can only do it during the night because you hate being seen. Also you just break into your target's house and shoot them point blank in their sleep so your attacks are unstoppable instead of powerful.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can only use your ability thrice.
- Shooting a town member disables your ability the following night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Town goal but the Town is spelled "Town"
